channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Chris & Jordan On Hollywood, Disney, Netflix & Media [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: In the absence of Pastor Nate, Chris & Jordan take over the show to further discuss The Sound of Freedom movie, more movies, Hollywood secrets, Netflix, Disney and media in general.  Should you cancel your Netflix subscription and put your money in Christian media?  Hear what Rebels #2 and #3 have to say!
item.author: Pastor Chris & Jordan
item.itunes:author: Pastor Chris & Jordan

item.title: What's With This Sound of Freedom Movie? [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
With all the bad-mouthing and criticizm of The Sound of Freedom movie, the Rebels believe there are several important points to emphasize.  What can be so wrong about fighting child sex slavery and trafficing?  Why are almost all the mainline media outlets rushing to say negative things about it? 

The Rebels take a break from their Biblical Cosmology series to explore what the uproar is all about.

As always if you'd like to support the show become a Fight Laugh Feast Club member or support our show specifically by signing up for a small monthly donation at https://www.patreon.com/reformedrebel
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
